name: Pentaflux
description:
Our explorer is running around ruins of the old humanity and fighting off ruin guardians. his trusty backpacks support him on his adventure

Name: Pentaflux Our explorer is running around ruins of the old humanity and fighting off ruin guardians. his trusty backpacks support him on his adventure! Controls: WASD - Movement LMB - Shoot RMB - Dash R - Reload ESC - Pause Team: Jake Ruth - Programmer Tremaine Phinney - Programmer Judah Avery - Designer & Animator René Mönch - 3D Artist
